snippet: On April 18, as part of the fifth anniversary of the Brooklyn Museum's Elizabeth A. Sackler Center for Feminist Art, the museum will present the First Awards to 15 women who were first in their fields, including Sandra Day O'Connor, Jessye Norman,...
abstract: On April 18, as part of the fifth anniversary of the Brooklyn Museum's Elizabeth A. Sackler Center for Feminist Art, the museum will present the First Awards to 15 women who were first in their fields, including Sandra Day O'Connor, Jessye Norman, Toni Morrison, Connie Chung and Chief Wilma Pearl Mankiller, the first female chief of the Cherokee Nation.
